title: Don’t believe this FAKE picture of PM Modi; here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of Prime Minister Narendra Modi is doing rounds on social media, in the viral picture, PM Modi can be seen holding a plate with cow dung on it.

ALSO READ: Don’t believe this FAKE picture of Rahul Gandhi smoking; here’s the…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

We scanned through Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s official Twitter handle and found the original picture in which PM Modi is actually eating ‘Litti Chokha’.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that the original picture has been manipulated using photo editing software.

The original picture was tweeted by PM Modi on this official Twitter handle on February 19, 2020, when he visited Hunar Haat in Delhi.
